item.description:
A member of the group is showing the film Afghan Star at the Charles River Campus of Boston University. This film delves into the political instability that has engulfed Afghanistan but it also goes on shows attempts at democracy. It describes the harsh realities of gender inequality and the ethnic differences that exist in Afghanistan. The movie will be followed by a discussion.

A trailer for the film can be found at this link: http://www.youtube.co....

The date is 1 Dec at Charles River campus College of Communications (COM 101, a lecture hall) at 7pm.

Map of Charles River Campus: http://physics.bu.edu...
The College of Communications lecture hall is building 30 on the map. The lecture hall is accessible by T on the green line. Parking is available in lot H at One University Rd.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: International Film - Afghan Star
